name: Final Fantasy VI: T-Edition
overview: Final Fantasy VI T-Edition is a popular Japanese ROM hack of Final Fantasy VI for the Super Famicom, translated to English in 2021 and released on Romhacking.net. It's intended for Final Fantasy VI fans who would like to play the game with new twists. Think of it as a fun, lengthy, and more difficult version of FF6 from an alternate universe. Features: • Retains the original story, but adds a LOT of new content *around* the main story, including side quests, locations, dungeons, super-bosses, unlockable character costumes (each with stat changes), a music player, and more • Celebrates the Final Fantasy series in countless ways, including hundreds of pieces of music from other games in the series • Updates the game's mechanics with bug fixes, difficulty modifications, new spells, new attacks, new items, and a whole lot more!
